short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download your Airbnb host EU VAT invoices automatically. Yes, automatically! Supports all available EU domains and languages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In a nutshell, VAT invoices are required for accounting purposes by European tax law (reverse-charge) but Airbnb does not provide tools for it. Instead it forces hosts to click each reservation, open a web page and print as PDF the VAT invoice. This is absolutelly unnecessary and consumes hundreds of hours of manual work!

This extension is NOT affiliated with Airbnb.It was developed with the sole intention to help all European hosts.

The extension DOESNâ€™T SAVE any data of any sort. NO passwords, NO financials, NO nothing! Learn more how it works on our privacy policy: https://vatinvoicer.com/privacy

Register for a FREE trial or BUY a license at: https://vatinvoicer.com

Step: 1: Enter a valid license key the license settings (cog icon).
Step: 2: Make sure you are logged in on your Airbnb account.
Step 3: Choose your country (must be the same you are logged in).
Step 4: Add one or more reservation codes in the textarea below.
Step 5: Click download and wait, don't exit the popup or click the tabs!

Airbnb brand and logo are trademarks of Airbnb, Inc.
